mapper.update: UPDATE AUTHEN_SECRET_KEY SET UPDATED_DT = , UPDATED_BY = #{mdps,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_SID = #{mdss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{dataDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGIN_PASSORD = #{secretKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAIN_ACCOUNT = #{mainAccount.account,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE ID = #{atid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, CREATED_DT, CREATED_BY, CREATED_SID, UPDATED_DT, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_SID, REMARK, , V.* from AUTHEN_SECRET_KEY T LEFT JOIN V_USER_AUTH V ON T.MAIN_ACCOUNT=V.ACCOUNT where ID = #{atid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete:
